titles.title: To prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from requiring the sounding of a locomotive horn in suburban areas in nonpeak traffic hours.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/20/2005--Introduced. Amends federal transportation law to prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from requiring the sounding of a locomotive horn in suburban areas in nonpeak traffic hours.
